label: iChannel{i}
detail: (sampler2D) Sampler for input texture of index i

label: iChannelResolution[1-4]
detail: (vec3) Input texture resolution for each channel

label: iChannelTime
detail: (float) Time for channel (if video or sound), in seconds

label: iDate
detail: (vec4) Year, month, day, time in seconds in .xyzw

label: iFrameRate
detail: (float) Number of frames rendered per second

label: iMouse
detail: (vec4) xy = current pixel coords (if LMB is down). zw = click pixel

label: iResolution
detail: (vec3) The viewport resolution (z is pixel aspect ratio, usually 1.0)

label: iTimeDelta
detail: (float) Time it takes to render a frame, in seconds
